card.name: Airatano
card.text: Unique. Court member of Ardor. He does not need to tap to play Dark-forges, Forged Below, or Reforging; only one of these cards can be on him at any given time. tap make any non-unique ore playable at his current under-deeps site. You may play Delver’s Harvest or Earth-eater (as if it was a normal resource) on his company at any under-deeps Ruins & Lairs [R] site.

attr.value: Men — 5 strikes with 9 prowess (can only be cancelled by a magic, skill, or spell card)
If opponent has a faction in play at this site, this site contains a hoard, and the first item played here does not tap the site.
s w b w s j s
w w j j j s

Only characters with a home site in the Sun-lands or the Uttersouth may brought into play at this site. Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled.
Creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.

card.name: Ardan Card Deck
card.text: Court Member of Ardor only. Any bearer of an Ardan Card Deck can support another bearer on an Ardan Card Deck as if they where in same company. A support to a CC is modified by supporting characters mind and subtracting the regions between both characters (to a maximum of 3 and a minimum of 1). Any bearer’s company may use any other’s bearers Lost or Stolen Knowledges as if it were present in his company.

card.name: Ardana
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. Can use spirit-magic. +2 EI against elves. When Ardana is at Citadel of Ardor you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. If bearing an Ardan Card Deck, she can tap to modify any CC by another bearer of an Ardan Card Deck by +2.

card.name: Ardaron
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Can use spirit-magic. Any Calm-song or Poison of his Voice he uses is shuffled back into the deck instead of discarded.

card.name: Arduin
card.text: Unique. Tatya. Can use spirit-magic. +1 to his CC when caused by a spirit-magic card. Any Spying out the Land he uses is shuffled back into the deck instead of discarded.

card.name: Ardûval
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. +2 EI against Elves. Assignment Forsaken may be played on himas if he were a Court of Ardor; tap shuffle one Assignment Forsaken from your sideboard into your deck. While Star of High Hope, Stars or TheEvenstar is in play he can use spirit-magic; his CC caused by spirit-magic cards receive +2. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

card.name: Arrokko
card.text: Horse. Playable at any Hidden site in Ardor. tap modify a CC forced by a hazard on an elf in the company by +2.tap cancel an animal (without an asterix *) or a demon attack keyed to any region in Ardor against its company. A player can only have 1 copy of Arrokko in play for each XXX in play.

attr.value: (1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against hero; canceled against Court of Ardor companies); (2nd) Elf — 1 strike with 14 prowess (only against overt or an avatar's company)

card.name: Book of Andraax
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. tap at any Hold of the Court of Ardor to make Guild of Element items playable at the site till the end of the turn. If at such a site bearer makes a CC modified by -2 to take either Hiding or Refuge from your play deck to your hand.

card.name: Bracers of Mira
card.text: Unique. Shield. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. If bearer carries not other items (except a staff) he receives +1 to prowess and body to a max. of 10.tap shuffle a spirit-magic or spell card just used by the bearer to the playdeck instead of discarding it. Bracers of Mira is worth 3 mp if born by a character in the Uttersouth (or its adjacent regions) if and member of the Court of Ardor is in play by your opponent.

card.name: Cambragol
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. May always be asigned 2 strikes of any attack, regardless of the his status. May use up to 2 warrior skill cards against the same strike. May take trophies as if an overt character.

card.name: Camring
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. +2 prowess against Undead and Magic-users. May take Undead creatures as hero tropies.

card.name: Court of Ardor
card.text: Playable if you control at least 4 more Court Members of Ardor than all other opponent’s combined.

card.name: Curubor
card.text: Unique. Tatya. Court Member of Ardor. Ardor Agent. In a one character company during CvCC you may discard either Burglary or An Article Missing from your hand to steal a non-ring item from opponent’s company.

card.name: Earrings of Lyerin
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. Cannot be used if bearer also uses a helmet. (If bearer carries ) tap shuffle a spirit-magic or spell card just used by the bearer to the playdeck instead of discarding it. more

card.name: Elendor
card.text: Unique. Tatya. May use any 2 one-handed weapons at the same time. Must always be asigned the first strike of any attack regardless of her status.

card.name: Elven Fortress
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company using region cards with the last one being a Jungle [j]. This card is used as a site card, Border-hold[B] (automatic-attack: Elves — 3 strikes at 8 prowess (detainment against hero and Court of Ardor companies, items: (minor*), *only items battle-gear items or items which have Elf or elven in the card title; cards opponent draws: 2, you draw 1). Alternatively playable on an Elf-hold in a Jungle [j]; tap a scout and a ranger an the site to turn the site into a hidden site; all companies must tap an avatar, or a scout or a ranger when target site is revealed as a new site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Elves of Talirân
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tauronde if the influence check is greater than 10.Standart modifications: Noldo (+2), Sinda (+2), Khelno (-3), Dunedain (+1), Hathorians (+2), any Elf faction in play by The Court of Ardor (-2)Elves of Talirân is worth 1 additional mp for each hidden Jewel of Unlight you have in play.

attr.value: (1st) Traps — each character faces a strike with 8 prowess (using either his body or mind value against it); (2nd) Dwarves — 4 strikes with 10 prowess (canceled if the company contains only Dwarves)
Durang and Vein of Arda is playable at this site. *Non-unique hoard items are playable here; the first (Guild of Elements) item played here does not tap the site.

card.name: Falcon's Crest
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Playable at any Court of Ardor hold. +1 body to a maximum of 9. If bearer also controls an ally with flying he receives +2 prowess. All rolls to keep control of this ally are modified by +3. Your receive this card’s mp when you control an ally with flying outsite a Court of Ardor hold.

card.name: Fëatur
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Can use spirit-magic. Member of the Guild of Elements. + 2 EI against elves and Dunedain. A White player player may use Fëatur as a grey agent, for which his home site becomes Tumlinde. He is considered a Court Member of Ardor, if the female Fëatur is not in play. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

attr.value: Member of the Guild of Elements

card.name: Fëatur
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. Can use spirit-magic and shadow-magic. +2 EI against non-Noldo, non-Sinda elves.

card.name: Ganim
card.text: Unique. Playable at a non-haven site in Gan, if the influence check is greater than 8.Standart modifications: Mûmkani (-2), Hathorians (+2), Khelnôr (-2), Kirani (+2) tap to bring one Oliphaunt from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: (1st) Aninals — 3 strikes with 6 prowess; (2nd) Traps — 1 strike with 10 prowess
Swamp. *Contains a hoard if opponent discard's a lost knowledge it controls; 2nd automatic-attack must be faced after the play of a major item at the site.

Swamp. *Contains a hoard if opponent discard's a lost knowledge it controls; 2nd automatic-attack must be faced after the play of a major item at the site.

card.name: Gorthaur
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. Can use sorcery. Assignment Forsaken may be played on him as if he were a Court of Ardor; tap shuffle one Assignment Forsaken from your sideboard into your deck.

card.name: Hated Elves
card.text: Dunedain and men with a home site in the Uttersouth and elves are effected by Unhappy Blows as if they were dwarves and elves.If any one player has a Dunedain, an Elf, and a Man faction in play remove this card from the game; it cannot be discarded by any other resource short-event.

card.name: Hathorians
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tanith if the influence check is greater than 11.Standart modifications: Kirani (+2), Sinda Elves (+2), Elves of Talirân (+3), overt or Ringwraith character (-4)Special: This faction is worth 5 mp to a non- White player.

card.name: Headband of Elerior
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. Bearer cannot be targeted by opponent’s spells or magic cards. Bearer can use spirit-magic. If bearer if a Wizard or Elf-lord, or could already use spirit-magic, he can opt to effect any company within his current region (or adjacent regions) with any 1 spirit-magic card per turn.

card.name: Infested Jungles
card.text: Non-unique Awakend Plant creatures may be played keyed to Jungle [j] regions (by type or name); and also to Ruins & Lairs [R] sites in these regions. Additionally, Darkness under Tree and Waiting Shadow may be played on characters moving with a Jungle [j] in their site path even if Doors of Night is not in play. You may tap a faction you have in play at a site in a Jungle region to cancel one of this card’s effects for one of your companies. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: (1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (canceled against Court of Ardor companies); (2nd) Demon — 1 strike with 14 prowess (only against overt or an avatar's company)

Byrillium-lode, Gems of Arda or Ithildin are playable at this site without further requirements; if any of these cards is played here, this site cannot be untapped or discarded and does never return to the location deck.

card.name: Jewel of Unlight
card.text: Jewel. Playable at any hidden site in Ardor (or maybe whole Uttersouth) and its adjacent regions. A Court of Ardor player must play them at any Free-hold [F] instead. tap cancel an environment played during bearer’s movement/hazard phase before it resolves. tap reveal to yourself any number of cards from the top of your deck, bearer makes a CC modified by on the number of cards revealed. Place a token on this card each time you reveal more than 5 cards from the top of your deck. Jewel of Unlight is worth 1 mp (to a maximum of 3) for each token placed on it.

card.name: Jungle demon
card.text: Demon. 1 strike

card.name: Khelekar
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. Can use sorcery. Any Bitter-cold he uses is shuffled back into your deck instead of discarded. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

card.name: Khelnôr
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Elf-hold in Ardor where no other Elf faction is in play if the influence check is greater than 10.

card.name: Kirani
card.text: Unique. Playable at Korlan if the influence check is greater than 9. Standart modifications: Elves (+2), any manifestation of Indûr Dawndeath in play (-4), Elves of Talirân (+3), Khelnôr (-2)If placed under Profitable Trade this faction is worth 1 additional mp (to a maximum of 3) for each resource permanent-event played on Kirani or Korlan

card.name: Kirlhach
card.text: Unique. Weapon. +2 prowess (+3 and -1 to strike’s body against Demons and Members of the Court of Ardor). tap during CvCC to untap bearer. Bearer makes a CC when Kirlhach becomes tapped.

card.name: Klaen
card.text: Unique. Noldo. +2 prowess against magic users. +2 EI against Elves and Men with home sites in the Uttersouth. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

card.name: Laurelindorenan
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at any Hidden site in the Uttersouth. If bearer is moving through a Jungle [j] region, he may use Herblore as if Radagast (and treating the Jungle [j] as the required Wilderness [w] region). During his end-of-turn phase bearer may tap to place Herblore from his hand with this item, Herblore stays with the item and is considered to be in your hand until used.

card.name: Laurrë Menelrana
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Member of the Guild of Elements. +2 prowess against magic users and Court Members of Ardor. May use any weapon with Elven Blade on it, as if a warrior. +3 EI against elves and elf factions playable in the Uttersouth or its adjacent regions. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

card.name: Moran
card.text: Unique. Noldo./Tatya. +2 to his CC while any Court Member of Ardor is in play by an opponent. +1 to all body check against manifestations of a Court Member of Ardor. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth. You may play Moran from your sideboard if discard a Guinarnen from your hand at any of the sites where Guinarnen could normally be played.

card.name: Morelen
card.text: Unique. Noldo./Tatya. All Court Members of Ardor receive +1 prowess and +1 to their CC if Morelen is in their company.

card.name: Morfuin
card.text: Unique. Court Member of Ardor. +2 EI against warrior characters. Morfuin may use Scourge of Fire as if he were a Balrog in Flame of Ûdun mode. tap shuffle one Scourge of Fire from your sideboard into your deck.

card.name: Mornaur
card.text: Unique. Noldo. tap receive sorcery skill till the end of the turn. If using Some Secret Art of Flame, hereceives an additional +2 prowess.

card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. +2 EI against Noldo and Tatya elves. Assignment Forsaken may be played on him as if he were a Court of Ardor. tap shuffle one Assignment Forsaken from your sideboard into your deck.

card.name: Power of the Court Set Forth
card.graphics: Power of the Court Set Forth.jpg
card.text: Playable if you have at least 3 Court Members of Ardor at a Court-hold. Discard a magic card from your hand to place either Drowining Seas with a Port or a site in Coastal Seas [c], or Nature’s Revenge with a site in a Jungle [Jj] or Devastation on a Border-hold [B] or Shadow-hold [S] (not a Court-hold) in the Uttersouth; these cards cannot be discarded while this card is in play and affect every company moving to these sites. These sites may be as many regions away from the Court-hold as you tap Court Members of Ardor at the site. Discard this card if you cannot tap a Court Member of Ardor at the Court-hold during end-of-turn-phase. You receives 1 mp to a maximum of 3 for each site your affect with any of the named cards above Cannot be dupliaced on a given Court-hold.

attr.value: Men — 4 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if the company does not contains elves)

card.name: Rána
card.text: Unique. Nelya. Member of the Guild of Elements. Healing cards Rána uses affect all characters in his company. Master Healer may be played on Rána. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Uttersouth.

card.name: Rilia
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court member of Ardor. Can use spirit-magic. +2 EI against Kelno Elves. Ancient Skill and Wisdom may be played on her, regardless of the mind restriction or her site.

card.name: Ringlin's Axe
card.text: Unique. Axe. Weapon. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. +2 prowess to a maximum of 9 (+4 to a maximum of 10 against Demons). Elven Blade may be played on Ringlin’s Axe, which then also works against Demon attacks. Ringlin’s Axe is worth 3 mp if born by a character in the Utter-south (or its adjacent regions) if a Member of the Court of Ardor is in play by your opponent.

card.text: Unique. Magic Ring. Playable at any Guild of Elements site. The bearer receives +2 body, for all none combat effects (Plague, A Malady without Healing, etc.).

Elf, Half-elf or Wizard only.+3 to all CC required by either “fire” spell or “fire” magic cards. tap place a “fire” spell or magic card to your deck instead of your discard pile, or to give bearer +2 prowess or body against a “fire” based attack.

card.name: Taurion
card.text: Unique. Tatya. Can use shadow-magic.

attr.value: Non-Elf, non-Wizard characters may only be brought into play at this site, if one of their home sites is within the Uttersouth territory.

(1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 8 prowess; (2nd) Traps - Elven Wards - 3 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (3rd) Elves — 4 strikes with 11 prowess (only against overt companies)

Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site (unless your Ringwraith has a home site in the Uttersouth).

card.name: The Destruction of Anar and Ithil
card.graphics: The Destruction of Anar and Ithil.jpg
card.text: Unique. Ritual. Playable at the Citadel of Ardor if you have a stored orc and technology item at the site. Add a token to this card during the site phase. During you end-of-turn phase make a roll adding 1 for each Member of the Court of Ardor, +4 for each Jewel of Unlight, +2 for each magic card you discard from your hand or the company; add +1 for the first token, +2 for the second (etc). If the result is more than 25, you receives this card’s mp. Folling cards cannot be played: Dawn Comes Early, Dawn Take You All, Moon, New Moon, Sun, and The Sun Shone Fiercely. Additionally these cards are never discarded: Mordó, Morgoth’s Ring. and Night. If you receives this card’s mp, all Members of the Court of Ardor requires 2 less mind to control and receive +2 to all CC.

card.name: The Order of Horus
card.text: Unique. Playable at Vog Mur if the influence check is greater than 11. Standart modifications: For any treasure item the company discards (+2), Dunedain(+1)Special. This faction if worth 3 mp if campaigning; +1 if at Battle-ground site; +1 if under the control of Valkrist.

card.name: Tiara of Lysa
card.text: Unique. Jewel. Playable at any Guild of Elements site.

attr.value: (1st) Animals — 3 strikes with 10 prowess (an ally with flying may tap to cancel this attack); (2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 3 prowess (attacker chooses); both are canceled against companies containing only dunadan andelves.

card.text: Unique. Tatya. May be asigned as many strikes from an attack as her base prowess fits into the attacks prowess.

card.name: Valandor
card.text: Unique. Tatya. +1 prowess against attacks keyed to a Jungle [j} region or to sites in such a region.

card.name: Valglin
card.text: Unique. Tatya. Court Member of Ardor. Ardor Agent. Can use Counterfeit as a skill card, to turn into a Dunadan or Man (place a token to mark you choice). Valglin is only considered as such for company composition only.

card.name: Valkrist
card.text: Unique. Half-elf. Leader. Court Member of Ardor. +2 EI against The Order of Horus faction.

card.name: Vallin
card.text: Unique. Sinda. +2 EI against animal factions. Vallin is considered a ranger while moving with only Jungle [j] regions in his site path. All animal/horse allies under his control receive +1 prowess and body; if such an ally is eliminated wound Vallin (no body check is required).

card.name: Valmorgûl
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. +2 EI against Khelno elves. Can use shadow-magic and sorcery.

card.name: Valnaur
card.text: Unique. Tatya. tap to receive sorcery skill till the end of turn.

card.name: Valsûl
card.text: Unique. Tatya. +1 body if carrying a blade weapon.

card.name: Vilwarokko
card.text: Horse. Flying. Playable at any Hidden site in Ardor if you discard a Lost Knowledge. tap modify a CC forced by a resource on an elf in the company by +2. tap cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against its bearer or itself. The hazard limit against this company is increased by +1 if opponent is a minion player. A player can only have 1 copy of Vilwarokko in play for each XXX in play.

card.name: Winds of Taurang
card.text: Unique. Playable at Taurang if the influence check is greater than 11.Standart modifications: Magic-user (+2), +4 if a prisoner card/ character is eliminated from the company.Special: tap: attack any one character during your turn at any non-Haven site within the Ardor territory; the character faces a Demon/Slayer attack 1 strike with 12 prowess; resulting body checks are modified by +1. If this attack is defeaded invert this faction (and wound the character who influenced it), it cannot be reinverted, until another influence check against it is succesfully made.

card.name: Yavëkamba
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Court Member of Ardor. Healing cards Yavëkamba uses affect all characters in his company.
